column1: SAFE-1	Analysis zones are spatial zones that are inspected
SAFE-2	Analysis zones include movement zones and hole zones
SAFE-3	Hazard zones are spatial zones that involve safety issues
SAFE-4	Hazard zones include fall hazard zones so far
SAFE-5	Hazard zones are implied by analisis zones. In particular, fall hazard zones are implied by movement zones and hole zones
SAFE-6	Safety issues include an identifier, a description and a severity indicator
SAFE-7	Safety issues are mitigared by  mitigation elements, which have to be distinguished from other elements
SAFE-8	Hazard zones can be used to automatically detect safety issues
SAFE-9	A safety issue not automatically detected is related to the location where it is and the worker who has reported it
